title: The Girl He Never Noticed
overview: Faced with terrible financial circumstances, Jade gets a job as a personal secretary to the son of the richest shipping magnate, Eros, but things get complicated when, in a desperate attempt to secure a suitable heir to the company, Eros asks Jade to become his fake bride! Will they be able to keep their "relationship" strictly professional? Meanwhile, Eros finds Jade strangely familiar, but he can't figure out what's going on...
